products.title: Ceramic Stripe Med Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Inspired by the pristine white beaches of sunnier climates, the ceramic stripe med blue roman blind is a nautical dream and an explorers paradise. products.title: Cardigan Stripe Blue Horizon Roman Blind
products.description: With stretches of blue lying horizontally across, the cardigan stripe blue horizon is beautifully designed with the look of a textured fabric for the utmost character and charm. products.title: Truro Stripe Coastal Blue Roman Blind
products.description: A trio of gorgeous tones arranged into crisp, immaculately proportioned stripes creates this wonderfully modern yet timeless truro stripe coastal blue roman blind. products.title: Tutbury Stripe Aqua Roman Blind
products.description: Cool yet inviting, this tutbury stripe aqua roman blind takes crisp shades and pairs them with the softest fabric to create a window dressing like no other. products.title: Watercolour Stripe Blue Roman Blind
products.description: What a statement piece this watercolour stripe roman blind will make in your home. Inspired by designer clarissa hulse's travels to far flung destinations these hand painted stripes create watercolour landscapes across the fabric. The bold blue tones are at once wow-inducing and what a statement piece this watercolour stripe roman blind will make in your home.
